mapper.select: SELECT b.REGION_NUM as regionNum , b.REGION_LEVEL_1 as regionLevel1 , b.REGION_LEVEL_2 as regionLevel2 , b.REGION_LEVEL_3 as regionLevel3 , b.REGION_LEVEL_4 as regionLevel4 FROM PLAN_REGION a JOIN REGION b ON a.REGION_NUM = b.REGION_NUM WHERE a.PLAN_NUM = #{planNum};

SELECT REGION_NUM as regionNum , REGION_LEVEL_1 as regionLevel1 , REGION_LEVEL_2 as regionLevel2 , REGION_LEVEL_3 as regionLevel3 , REGION_LEVEL_4 as regionLevel4 FROM REGION WHERE REGION_NUM = #{regionNum};

SELECT REGION_NUM AS regionNum, REGION_LEVEL_1 AS regionLevel1, REGION_LEVEL_2 AS regionLevel2, REGION_LEVEL_3 AS regionLevel3, REGION_LEVEL_4 AS regionLevel4 FROM REGION WHERE 1=1
AND CONCAT( IFNULL(REGION_LEVEL_1, ''), ' ', IFNULL(REGION_LEVEL_2, ''), ' ', IFNULL(REGION_LEVEL_3, ''), ' ', IFNULL(REGION_LEVEL_4, '') ) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{token}, '%')
LIMIT 10

SELECT REGION_NUM as regionNum , REGION_LEVEL_1 as regionLevel1 , REGION_LEVEL_2 as regionLevel2 , REGION_LEVEL_3 as regionLevel3 , REGION_LEVEL_4 as regionLevel4 FROM REGION WHERE REGION_LEVEL_4 LIKE CONCAT('%', #{level4}, '%') LIMIT 1

SELECT REGION_NUM as regionNum , REGION_LEVEL_1 as regionLevel1 , REGION_LEVEL_2 as regionLevel2 , REGION_LEVEL_3 as regionLevel3 , REGION_LEVEL_4 as regionLevel4 FROM REGION WHERE REGION_LEVEL_3 LIKE CONCAT('%', #{level3}, '%') LIMIT 1

SELECT REGION_NUM as regionNum , REGION_LEVEL_1 as regionLevel1 , REGION_LEVEL_2 as regionLevel2 , REGION_LEVEL_3 as regionLevel3 , REGION_LEVEL_4 as regionLevel4 FROM REGION WHERE REGION_LEVEL_2 LIKE CONCAT('%', #{level2}, '%') LIMIT 1

SELECT REGION_NUM as regionNum , REGION_LEVEL_1 as regionLevel1 , REGION_LEVEL_2 as regionLevel2 , REGION_LEVEL_3 as regionLevel3 , REGION_LEVEL_4 as regionLevel4 FROM REGION WHERE REGION_LEVEL_1 LIKE CONCAT('%', #{level1}, '%') LIMIT 1
